title: Software 2.0 (2017)
dot:
digraph SoftwareParadigms{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box];Software1_0[label="Software 1.0
(Classical Programming)
- Explicit instructions
- Written by programmers
- Languages: Python, C++, etc.
- Compiled into binaries", shape=ellipse];Software2_0[label="Software 2.0
(Neural Networks)
- Abstract representation
- Weights of neural networks
- No explicit coding by humans
- Training compiles datasets into functioning models", shape=ellipse];Characteristics[label="Characteristics", shape=rect, style=dashed];S1_Characteristics[label="Classical Stack
- Complex instruction set
- Hard to optimize
- Programmer-driven", shape=box];S2_Characteristics[label="Neural Network Stack
- Matrix multiplication & ReLU
- Easy to optimize
- Data-driven", shape=box];Benefits[label="Benefits of Software 2.0", shape=rect, style=dashed];Benefit1[label="- Computationally homogeneous", shape=box];Benefit2[label="- Simple to bake into silicon", shape=box];Benefit3[label="- Constant running time", shape=box];Benefit4[label="- Constant memory use", shape=box];Benefit5[label="- Highly portable", shape=box];Benefit6[label="- Very agile", shape=box];Benefit7[label="- Modules can meld into an optimal whole", shape=box];Benefit8[label="- Better performance than human-written code", shape=box];Limitations[label="Limitations of Software 2.0", shape=rect, style=dashed];Limitation1[label="- Hard to interpret models", shape=box];Limitation2[label="- Risk of biases", shape=box];Limitation3[label="- Unintuitive failures", shape=box];Transition[label="Ongoing Transition", shape=rect, style=dashed];Example1[label="- Visual Recognition
- From engineered features to CNNs", shape=box];Example2[label="- Speech Recognition
- From Gaussian models to neural nets", shape=box];Example3[label="- Machine Translation
- From phrase-based to neural approaches", shape=box];Software1_0->S1_Characteristics;Software2_0->S2_Characteristics;Software2_0->Benefits;Benefits->Benefit1;Benefits->Benefit2;Benefits->Benefit3;Benefits->Benefit4;Benefits->Benefit5;Benefits->Benefit6;Benefits->Benefit7;Benefits->Benefit8;Software2_0->Limitations;Limitations->Limitation1;Limitations->Limitation2;Limitations->Limitation3;Software2_0->Transition;Transition->Example1;Transition->Example2;Transition->Example3;}
